mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.bingli_uuid_number as bingliUuidNumber ,a.bingli_name as bingliName ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.bingli_bingqing as bingliBingqing ,a.jianchaxiangmu as jianchaxiangmu ,a.jianchajieguo as jianchajieguo ,a.yaodan_text as yaodanText ,a.bingli_file as bingliFile ,a.bingli_time as bingliTime ,a.yisheng_id as yishengId ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yisheng.yisheng_uuid_number as yishengUuidNumber ,yisheng.yisheng_name as yishengName ,yisheng.yisheng_photo as yishengPhoto ,yisheng.yisheng_phone as yishengPhone ,yisheng.yisheng_id_number as yishengIdNumber ,yisheng.yisheng_email as yishengEmail ,yisheng.yisheng_delete as yishengDelete ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM bingli a left JOIN yisheng yisheng ON a.yisheng_id = yisheng.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.bingli_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.bingliUuidNumber},'%')
and a.bingli_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.bingliName},'%')
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.bingli_bingqing like CONCAT('%',#{params.bingliBingqing},'%')
and a.jianchaxiangmu like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianchaxiangmu},'%')
and a.jianchajieguo like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianchajieguo},'%')
and a.yaodan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yaodanText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.bingli_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.bingliTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.bingli_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.bingliTimeEnd})
and ( a.yisheng_id = #{params.yishengId} )
and a.yisheng_id IS NOT NULL
and yisheng.yisheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengUuidNumber},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengName},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengPhone},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengIdNumber},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengEmail},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_delete >= #{params.yishengDeleteStart}
and yisheng.yisheng_delete <= #{params.yishengDeleteEnd}
and yisheng.yisheng_delete = #{params.yishengDelete}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
